programme.desc: The Nature Badge - The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep39
programme.desc: The Recipe Badge - The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep40
programme.desc: The Imagination Badge - When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Leaf Badge - The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Tag's First Day - The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep21
programme.desc: The Days of the Week Badge - After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep22

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep23
programme.desc: The Choir Badge - The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep24

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep25
programme.desc: The Wisdom Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep26

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep28

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Gyeongju, 280 kilometers southeast of Seoul in South Korea, was the capital of the ancient Silla kingdom from 57 BCE to 935 CE. The city is dotted with over 200 ancient burial mounds from that era.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Tokachi is in Japan's great northern land of Hokkaido, home to vast fields and sprawling pastures. Experience its vibrant summer colors through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Daisen-Oki
programme.desc: Daisen-Oki National Park comprises the Oki Islands, which boast spectacular geological formations, and a mainland area with shrines and sacred mountains that gave rise to myths and legends.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: On a remote island, a group of women from around Japan sail a sabani, a traditional Okinawan fishing vessel. Through teamwork and dedication, they form strong bonds and take on a grueling race.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #39 I lost my wallet. / To explain that you did something you didn't intend to, use the "te" form of a verb, and add "shite shimaimashita." So, "otosu" (to drop) becomes "otoshite shimaimashita."

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The ancient capital's dignified air is in part generated by earthen walls. Discover the aesthetic sensibilities and expertise of a traditional plasterer as he pursues beauty in earthen walls.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Trekking on Hokkaido's highest peak, Mt. Asahidake! Discover the mountain's breathtaking sites during this two-day hike in the stunning autumn colors that appear here before anywhere else in Japan!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Decoding The I-Soon Document Leaks
programme.desc: Teaming with experts in 7 locations around the world, we conducted an analysis of internal records leaked from a Chinese cybersecurity company, delving into the new threats spreading on the internet.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Fujii Kaze: Climb To The World
programme.desc: A renowned Japanese artist and international star, 27-year-old Fujii Kaze is taking on the world. We look behind the scenes and explore the appeal of his continually-evolving music.

programme.title: On The Wings 5Min.
programme.desc: Fly over northern Japan in autumn on a plane! Hop onboard a flight from Tokyo to New Chitose Airport in Hokkaido, and see the beautiful mountains in full autumnal foliage from 40,000 feet in the air.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: In Okayama, Land of Sunshine, we meet high school students revolutionizing a town's famous denim, then ride into the countryside to see a traditional storyteller.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-16.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at Japan's innovative, efficient, and convenient laundry services.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: What's it like living with cats in rice-producing Niigata? See kitty beds made of straw from beautiful green rice paddies, and enjoy snacks with another kitty at a candy shop.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Macau for the first time in a decade on November 23, and fight fans in China will be treated to a highly anticipated main event as former world champions Petr Yan and Deiveson Figueiredo clash in a five-round battle that could shake up the bantamweight title picture. Brazils Figueiredo has been unstoppable since moving to 135 pounds, but to make his case for a shot at the belt, he must first vanquish Russias No Mercy Yan. Plus, Chinas own Yan Xiaonan makes her first start since her thrilling challenge for the strawweight championship when she takes on fellow 115-pound contender Tabatha Ricci.

programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.

programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Macau for the first time in a decade on November 23, and fight fans in China will be treated to a highly anticipated main event as former world champions Petr Yan and Deiveson Figueiredo clash in a five-round battle that could shake up the bantamweight title picture. Brazils Figueiredo has been unstoppable since moving to 135 pounds, but to make his case for a shot at the belt, he must first vanquish Russias No Mercy Yan. Plus, Chinas own Yan Xiaonan makes her first start since her thrilling challenge for the strawweight championship when she takes on fellow 115-pound contender Tabatha Ricci.
